title: Client Onboarding - Network Documentation
description: During onboarding, a technician needs to document a new client's network infrastructure.

tasks.description: Run a network scan using a discovery tool to identify all devices on the network (servers, switches, printers, etc.).
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician gets a complete list of all network-connected devices.

tasks.description: Log in to each network device to document its configuration (e.g., firewall rules, switch VLANs).
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician gathers all configuration details.

tasks.description: Create detailed documentation and a network diagram in the central documentation system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client's network is fully documented for future support.
